1#![allow(clippy::tabs_in_doc_comments)]
2#![warn(missing_debug_implementations, missing_docs, rust_2018_idioms)]
3#![deny(unreachable_pub)]
4#![forbid(elided_lifetimes_in_paths, unsafe_code)]
5
6/*!
7This crate is an extension to the popular [gotham web framework][gotham] for Rust. It aims to
8reduce boilerplate necessary to read request bodies today as a stop-gap until gotham finally
9implements a [body extractor].
10
11# :sparkles: Features
12
13- Parse `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` request bodies
14- Parse `multipart/form-data` request bodies
15- Verify the parsed request body
16- `#![forbid(unsafe_code)]` ensures that all functionality is implemented in 100% safe Rust code
17
18# :warning: Warning
19
20This crate is asynchronous, but does not yet enforce uploads limits. **YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE
21FOR ENFORCING UPLOAD LIMITS.**
22
23# :spiral_notepad: Example
24
25```rust
26# use gotham::handler::HandlerError;
27# use gotham::helpers::http::response::*;
28# use gotham::hyper::{Body, Response, StatusCode};
29# use gotham::state::State;
30# use mime::TEXT_PLAIN;
31use gotham_formdata::FormData;
32use validator::Validate;
33
34#[derive(FormData, Validate)]
35struct LoginData {
36	#[validate(length(min = 5, max = 16))]
37	username: String,
38	#[validate(length(min = 8))]
39	password: String
40}
41
42async fn login_handler(state: &mut State) -> Result<Response<Body>, HandlerError> {
43	let login_data: LoginData = FormData::parse_form_data(state).await?;
44	Ok(if login_data.password == "secret" {
45		create_response(state, StatusCode::OK, TEXT_PLAIN, login_data.username)
46	} else {
47		create_empty_response(state, StatusCode::FORBIDDEN)
48	})
49}
50```
51
52# :label: Versioning
53
54Like all rust crates, this crate will follow semantic versioning guidelines. However, changing
55the MSRV (minimum supported rust version) is not considered a breaking change.
56
